preqs: For students enrolled in the Master of Business: MGX5962 and three of (ACF5903, BTF5903, ECF5953, ETF5900, MGF5020, MGF5030, MGX5991, MGX5992 or MKX5955)

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {3341.2, 3343, 3844, B6005} Do true Otherwise Any co-req (I/W) unit in {FIT5123, FIT9006, FIT9123}

For COURSE_CODE IN {3844.6} Do (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MGX5962} and  Must have passed 3 (I/W) units in {ACF5903, BTF5903, ECF5953, ETF5900, MGF5020, MGF5030, MGX5991, MGX5992, MKX5955}) Otherwise true

description: Covers the core skills for enterprise architects, addressing the structuring and delivery of IT services in organisations. Addresses topics including SaaS, Cloud computing, enterprise 2.0 and other collaborative technologies, services science management and engineering and services strategy.
